name: Spinda
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.

attacks.name: Staggering Steps
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, this Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Uproar
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
